segments.text: I see the girl standing there, reaching up for a cookie like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to notice how unstable her brother is on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even cares about the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she’s looking at the cookie jar, it’s like she’s in a trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how excited she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I remember the water and the tipping stool, and I get worried again.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s too young to realize the danger here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so chaotic, but she seems perfectly content.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice the water before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
